ygData.subject: Re: any human necromancers out there?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/18/99 1:06:26 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... O dear ... you have not been very deep in befallen have you.... There are about 8 Ghouls in
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/18/99 1:06:26 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
shdwpanther@... writes:

> Don't -- Fight -- The -- Ghoul
> :-)

O dear ... you have not been very deep in befallen have you....

There are about 8 Ghouls in befallen, MANY ice boned, and three Elf
skeletons. Plus the assorted necromancers, their pets at their level, and
the Shadow Knights...

At 10... NEVER go to the third level ... and think real hard about going to
the second. (at 11th level with a 5 person party i died, then died 8 more
times trying to get my body back.... not pretty place)

Sonoroud.
